entry.title: BitCoin TPB, P2P Currency/Torrent
entry.summary: The author of the email has an idea to implement a blockchain as a tracker, not necessarily related to Bitcoin. They suggest storing magnet links in the blockchain and using micro transactions to access content torrents. This would allow users to tip content sharers and make anonymous requests for specific content. The author is seeking opinions and possible development partners for a front-end system. However, it should be noted that the Pirate Bay's content is illegal and discussion of it may not be appropriate for this mailing list. The author also criticizes the use of spam transactions to access content. The email ends with a link to download BIRT iHub F-Type, a free enterprise-grade BIRT server.
